driverInputPrompts.name: Enable Permissions Reconciliation for LinuxUnixAccount Entitlement
Allow User add via publisher channel
Enable Permissions Reconciliation for all Custom entitlements
Allow data collection from user accounts
User account extensions
driverInputPrompts.value: <entitlement-extensions>	<member-assignment-query>		<query-xml>			<nds dtdversion="2.0">				<input>					<query class-name="User" scope="subtree">						<search-class class-name="loginName"/>						<read-attr/>					</query>				</input>			</nds>		</query-xml>	</member-assignment-query>	<query-extensions>		<query-xml>			<read-attr attr-name="Login Disabled"/>			<read-attr attr-name="loginName"/>			<operation-data data-collection-query="true"></operation-data>		</query-xml>	</query-extensions>	<account>		<account-id source="src-dn"/>		<account-id source="read-attr" source-name="loginName"/>						<account-id source="association"/>		<account-status active="false" inactive="true" source="read-attr" source-name="Login Disabled"/>	</account></entitlement-extensions>

driverFeaturedPackage.packageName: Linux and Unix Managed System Information
